mapper.select: select rnum as bnum, board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_writer as boardWriter, readcount as readCount, reg_date as regDate from (select rownum as rnum,n.* from (select* from board where boardtype=#{boardType} order by board_no desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from board where boardtype=#{boardType}
